content: amigurumi plush bear pattern by a little love everyday this pattern is written in us crochet terms and available in english skill level easy/intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - single_crochet - half_double_crochet - increase - invisible decrease - working in back loops - invisible fasten_off - slip_stitch materials you will need bulky weight blanket/chenille yarn in brown colour worsted weight yarn in white and any colour of your choice for scarf 5 mm and 3 5 mm crochet hook fiberfill for stuffing 12 mm safety eyes tapestry needle small amount of black and pink felt small button for scarf
